onboarding.title: Welcome to Perfect Interview!
onboarding.description: Let's help you prepare for your next interview. Here's how it works:

1.title: Job Details
1.description: First, tell us about the job you're applying for. Enter the job title, description, and optionally the company details.

2.title: Upload Documents
2.description: Next, upload your resume, cover letter, or any other relevant documents. This helps us tailor the interview questions to your experience.

3.title: Generate Questions
3.description: Finally, we'll analyze everything and generate personalized interview questions. This could take a few minutes, but it's worth the wait!

waitlist.title: Perfect Your Next Interview
waitlist.subtitle: Get AI-powered interview prep to ace your next job interview.

onboarding.title: Practice Your Interview Answers
onboarding.description: Get instant feedback on your interview answers. Here's how it works:

1.title: Multiple Ways to Answer
1.description: Type your answer or use voice recording - whatever feels most natural to you.

2.title: Instant Feedback
2.description: Get detailed feedback on your answers, including strengths and areas for improvement.

3.title: Unlimited Practice
3.description: Practice as much as you want - there's no limit to how many times you can answer each question.

generateAnswerOnboarding.title: Let AI Answer For You
generateAnswerOnboarding.description: Too lazy to answer the question yourself? Let AI generate a personalized answer for you.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Answers

personalized.title: Personalized to Your Experience
personalized.description: If you've uploaded your resume or cover letter, it will use your previous work experience to answer the question for you.

onboarding.title: Welcome to the Mock Interview Experience
onboarding.description: Practice your interview skills with our AI interviewer. Here's how it works:

1.title: Real Interview Experience
1.description: Chat with our AI interviewer that conducts a realistic job interview based on the position you're applying for.

2.title: Natural Conversation
2.description: Speak naturally as you would in a real interview - our AI interviewer will listen and respond accordingly.

3.title: Performance Review
3.description: After the interview, get detailed feedback on your performance, including areas of strength and improvement.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Does Perfect Interview Generate Questions Based On My Past Experience?
faq.a1: Yes! Perfect Interview generates questions based on your past experience, resume, and target job position. The questions are tailored to your personal experience and the job you're applying for.
faq.q2: Is there a limit to how many questions I can generate?
faq.a2: We currently set an upper limit of 200 practice questions per job. If you need more, please contact us and we can increase this limit for you.
faq.q3: What types of jobs does Perfect Interview support?
faq.a3: Perfect Interivew supports every single job in the world. As long as you upload the job description, we will be able to generate unlimtied practice questions for you.
faq.q4: Is there a limit to how many mock interviews I can do?
faq.a4: There is no limit to how many mock interviews you can do. Each mock interview is unique and tailored to the job you're applying for.
faq.q5: What types of jobs does perfect interview support
faq.a5: Perfect Interview supports every single job in the world. As long as you upload the job description, we will be able to create interview questions and interview copilots for you..

onboarding.title: Interview Copilot Setup Guide
onboarding.description: Follow these steps to set up your interview session

1.title: Open Your Interview in Chrome
1.description: To use the Interview Copilot, you must open up your interview in a Google Chrome tab.
1.description2: The Interview Copilot will not work with other browsers or if you open the interview in a desktop application â€” it MUST be in a Chrome tab.
1.description3: Select your meeting platform to see specific instructions on how to open it in Chrome.

zoom.name: Zoom
zoom.instruction: Open your Zoom meeting in Chrome instead of the desktop app:

teams.name: Microsoft Teams
teams.instruction: Open your Teams meeting in Chrome instead of the desktop app:

meet.name: Google Meet
meet.instruction: Google Meet opens in Chrome by default:

2.title: Share Your Meeting Tab
2.description: Click the "Select Interview Meeting Room" button and choose the Chrome tab with your meeting.

shareTabInstructions.mustShare: You MUST share the Chrome tab with the "Also share tab audio" option enabled.
shareTabInstructions.doNotShare: DO NOT share "window" or "entire screen" or else the Interview Copilot will not work.

3.title: Start the Interview Copilot
3.description: After sharing your interview tab, click the "Start Interview Copilot" button to begin.

exitWarning.title: Warning: Unsaved Recording
exitWarning.description: You have an unsaved interview recording. If you exit now, your recording will be lost.
exitWarning.instruction: To save your recording, please click the "End Interview Copilot" button before leaving.
